GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.146
GSD.description:
net/smc: Stop the CLC flow if no link to map buffers on

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.146 by commit d76151a8131e75e49ab65bc4ffa67dddc2ff6b3e, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit b9247544c1bccfe1b74ddf1dade719a69946cbb1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/smc: Stop the CLC flow if no link to map buffers on
